mapper.select: select a.post_id,a.post_title,a.pl_id,a.pl_title,a.sp_id,a.post_body,a.post_img,a.created_at,b.nick as updated_at from Posts a, users b where a.sp_id=b.sp_id and a.sp_id not in (select block_sp_id from block_users where sp_id =#{sp_id}) and a.post_id not in(select post_id from block_posts where sp_id =#{sp_id})
